entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Bagotville 08:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: E 28 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
